name: PhysDomino (Universal)
description:
PhysDomino is a Domino simulator based on physics.
Create the course of the domino with touch.

[Features]
- Gyro or Compass and Accelerometer provide 6-axis motion sensing.
- Retina display is supported.
- Realistic shadow by OpenGL ES 2.0.

[How To]
- Draw the course of domino with touch at the edit mode.
- Touch the domino at the simulation mode.

[Option Settings]
- Renderer (OpenGL ES 1.1 / OpenGL ES 2.0)
- Retina Display (On / Off)
- Shadow (On / Off)
- Motion Sensing Modes (Gyro / Compass / Accelerometer / None)
- Gravity
- Distance Between Tiles
